code: import Token from"./Token";export default function groupTextTokens(tokens){var result=[];var hasGroup=false;tokens.forEach(function(token,index){if(!token.block&&!hasGroup){hasGroup=true;result.push(new Token('textgroup',1));result.push(token);}else if(!token.block&&hasGroup){result.push(token);}else if(token.block&&hasGroup){hasGroup=false;result.push(new Token('textgroup',-1));result.push(token);}else{result.push(token);}});return result;}
